In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V l : V H_eq : filterlim (sum_n (fun k : nat => a (S k))) eventually (locally (plus l (opp (a 0%nat)))) H_series : V -> Prop Unable to unify "Prop" with "filterlim (sum_n a) eventually (locally l)".

original: intros H_eq H_series. unfold is_series in *. apply filterlim_ext with (f := sum_n a). - intro n. rewrite H_eq. reflexivity. - apply H_series.
